      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>

          <identifier>

            <entry>leno_es_20070518_2_0050204</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Lenguas primitivas de España: zonas de influjo</string>
            <string language="en">Primitive languages in Spain: areas of influence</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ursprüngliche Sprachen in Spanien: 
Bereiche des Einflusses</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Langages primitifs en Espagne : zones 
d'influence</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Línguas primitivas em Spain: áreas de 
influência</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lingue primitive in Spagna: zone di 
influenza</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρωτόγονες γλώσσες στην Ισπανία: τομείς της 
επιρροής</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Estudio de todas aquellas lenguas habladas en diversas zonas de España, antes de la llegada del latín con los romanos.</string>
            <string language="en">Study of all the languages spoken in different parts of Spain before the arrival of Latin with the Roman Empire.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Lengua Castellana y Literatura</string>
            <string language="en">Castilian and Literature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Lenguas primitivas</string>
            <string language="en">Primitive languages</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Studie aller Sprachen gesprochen in den 
unterschiedlichen Teilen von Spanien vor der Ankunft des Lateins mit 
dem römischen Reich.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Étude de tous les langages parlés dans 
différentes régions de l'Espagne avant l'arrivée du latin avec 
l'empire romain.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estudo de todas as línguas faladas em partes 
diferentes de Spain antes da chegada do latin com o império roman.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studio su tutti i linguaggi parlati nelle zone 
differenti della Spagna prima dell'arrivo di Latino con l'impero 
romano.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μελέτη όλων των γλωσσών προφορικών στα διαφορετικά 
μέρη της Ισπανίας πριν από την άφιξη των λατινικών με τη 
ρωμαϊκή αυτοκρατορία.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Castilian und Literatur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Ursprüngliche Sprachen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Castillan et littérature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Langages primitifs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Castilian e literatura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Línguas primitivas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Castilian e letteratura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lingue primitive</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καστιλιάνος και λογοτεχνία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρωτόγονες γλώσσες</string>
          </keyword>
